titleStmt.title: The tragicall historye of Romeus and Iuliet written first in Italian by Bandell, and nowe in Englishe by Ar. Br.
titleStmt.author: Brooke, Arthur, d. 1563.
Bandello, Matteo, 1485-1561. Novelle.

notesStmt.note: Adapted by Arthur Brooke from a French version by Pierre Boaistuau of "La sfortunata morte di dui infelicissimi amanti" by Matteo Bandello, from his "Novelle".
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio.
Identified as STC 3812 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
